All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BooleanAdapter
A JsonTypeAdapter for the primitive type boolean and its boxed type, Boolean.
ComplexHandler
Interface for a handler in case a SimpleHandler is not flexible enough.
ExceptionMessages
This class is mostly useful for unit tests, so we don't have to check for exceptions while working around unknown error messages -- this way we just know these messages.
ExceptionMessages
This class is mostly useful for unit tests, so we don't have to check for exceptions while working around unknown error messages -- this way we just know these messages.
FieldErrorNode
This class typically gets constructed by grumpyjson and consumed by grumpyrest, without any need for the application code to deal with it.
FieldErrorNode.Field
A node that specifies a single field nesting level for its subtree.
FieldErrorNode.FlattenedError
This structure represents a single error, i.e.
FieldErrorNode.InternalException
A leaf node with an internal exception.
FieldErrorNode.Message
A leaf node with an error message.
FieldErrorNode.Siblings
A node that groups two subtrees together to allow the tree to store multiple errors.
FieldMustBeNull
This can be used to implement a property that must be null during validation, and always serializes as null.
FieldMustBeNullAdapter
The JsonTypeAdapter for FieldMustBeNull.
FinishRequestException
This exception type can be thrown to immediately finish handling a request and respond with a specific response value.
FromStringParser
Implementations of this interface are used to parse a higher-level type from a string.
FromStringParserException
This exception gets thrown by a FromStringParser if the string to parse does not conform to the parser's expectation.
FromStringParserRegistry
This registry keeps FromStringParsers used to parse path parameters and querystring parameters.
HttpMethod
HTTP methods as an enum.
IdentityResponseFactory
This simply accepts response values that implement Response themselves.
IntegerAdapter
A JsonTypeAdapter for the primitive type int and its boxed type, Integer.
IntegerFromStringParser
Parses integers from their usual decimal text representation.
JsonElementAdapter
A JsonTypeAdapter for JsonElement.
JsonEngine
This class is the main entry point into the JSON conversion system.
JsonGenerationException
This exception type gets thrown when the state of the objects being serialized is not possible to map to JSON.
JsonRegistry
This registry keeps the JsonTypeAdapters used by a JsonEngine.
JsonResponseFactory
Converts any JSON-able value into a Response by invoking the JsonEngine, then sending the result with HTTP status code 200.
JsonTypeAdapter<T>
Defines the conversion from and to JSON for a single type.
JsonValidationException
This exception type gets thrown when the incoming JSON does not match the expected structure.
ListAdapter
This adapter handles type List<...>.
LiteralPathSegment
This segment only matches a request path segment with the exact same text.
NopResponse
Does not respond at all.
NoResponseFactoryException
This exception type gets thrown if no response factory can be found for a specific response value.
NullableField<T>
This can be used to wrap a property and allow JSON null instead of an actual value.
NullableFieldAdapter
The JsonTypeAdapter for NullableField.
NullResponseFactory
Produces an empty 200 response when null is returned as a response value.
OptionalField<T>
This can be used to wrap a property and allow it to be absent in JSON.
OptionalFieldAdapter
The JsonTypeAdapter for OptionalField.
ParameterizedTypeImpl
NOT PUBLIC API
ParseFromStringService
This interface exposes only the FromStringParserRegistry.parseFromString(String, Type) method.
Path
A path -- actually a path pattern -- that determines whether the actual path provided by a request matches a route.
PathArgument
A concrete argument that was bound to a path parameter.
PathSegment
A single segment from a Path.
PathUtil
NOT PUBLIC API
QuerystringParser
A QuerystringParser turns a querystring into a Java Object, typically a record since parsers for them can be auto-generated.
QuerystringParserRegistry
A registry for QuerystringParser objects.
QuerystringParsingException
Represents one or more errors from parsing the querystring.
QuerystringToRecordParser
This class implements an auto-generated record parser.
RecordAdapter<T>
A RecordAdapter is build for the raw type (class) of a record, so a single RecordAdapter handles all parameterized types for that raw type.
RecordInfo
NOT PUBLIC API
Request
This interface provides access to all properties of an HTTP request that are relevant for the REST API.
RequestCycle
Hold the run-time state of processing a single request.
RequestPathSourcingStrategy
This object defines how to obtain the request path from the servlet request.
Response
An object that knows how to express itself via HTTP to the client.
ResponseFactory
This factory knows how to turn specific kinds of response values into Response objects.
ResponseFactoryRegistry
Allows to register ResponseFactorys that provide Response implementations for other types of response values.
ResponseTransmitter
This interface is used by the Response to transmit itself to the client.
ResponseValueWrapper
If a handler returns an object implementing this interface, then it will be unwrapped (possibly multiple times if the wrapped value implements this interface again) before an appropriate Response is created for it.
RestApi
This class is the main Entry point into grumpyrest.
RestServlet
Java servlet that serves a REST API defined by a RestApi object.
Route
A route is, conceptually, a set of criteria that determine whether the route matches a specific requests, as well as a handler that defines what to do for requests that match.
RouteMatchResult
The result returned by RestApi.match(RequestCycle) and Route.match(RequestCycle).
SimpleHandler
Implementing this handler interface should be preferred over ComplexHandler whenever it is sufficient.
StandardErrorResponse
Implements a standard JSON-based error response format, combined with a selectable HTTP status code.
StandardErrorResponse.Field
Represents an error for a single field.
StatusOnlyResponse
Sends an empty response with a configurable HTTP status code.
StringAdapter
A JsonTypeAdapter for type String.
StringFromStringParser
Returns the argument text as a String without any actual parsing.
StringUtil
NOT PUBLIC API
TypeUtil
NOT PUBLIC API
TypeWrapper<T>
 
TypeWrapperAdapter
The JsonTypeAdapter for TypeWrapper.
VariablePathSegment
This segment matches any request path segment.
